content: errata there was a typo in v1 of the pattern in the gusset section please repeat rounds 1&2 **11** more times get ready to elevate your sock knitting with the everyday diamond socks pattern experience the joy of wearing or gifting these beautifully crafted socks featuring a charming diamond motif the everyday diamond socks pattern is a perfect choice for beginners looking to expand their skills or experienced knitters seeking a satisfying sock project with clear instructions and simple stitches you ll be able to create the delightful diamond pattern effortlessly the everyday diamond socks are knitted from the toe up using one skein of the fibre co amble a plump and woolly fingering weight yarn made from a blend of eco-friendly washable wool and alpaca for comfort as well as recycled nylon for strength *purchase a kit to knit the everyday diamond socks here * 1 **construction notes** knitted from the toe up beginner-friendly heel with no wraps and turns 1x1 ribbed cuff **skill level** suitable for an adventurous beginner who is looking to expand their skills **sizing** foot circumference 8 inches 20 5 cm foot length is adjustable knit until you are 2 5 6 5 cm away from the back of your heel leg length is adjustable the everyday diamon socks are designed as shorties worn on the ankle you can knit the leg as long as desired please remember that knitting a longer leg will require more yarn **yarn** the fibre co amble 70% easy-wash merino wool 20% easy-wash alpaca 10% recycled nylon 300m 328 yd per 100g skein 1 skein in white heather **needles** 2mm us0 needles
